# Wrap Database Errors Consistently

## ðŸŸ¡ Medium Priority

### Summary
Not all Prisma errors wrapped in DatabaseError.

### Implementation
```typescript
try {
  return await db.project.create({ data });
} catch (error) {
  if (error instanceof Prisma.PrismaClientKnownRequestError) {
    throw new DatabaseError(`Failed to create project: ${error.message}`, error.code);
  }
  throw new DatabaseError('Unexpected database error');
}
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Wrap all Prisma errors
- [ ] Add context to messages
- [ ] Distinguish error types
- [ ] Log original errors

### Estimated Effort
2-3 hours
